docs.lead_paragraph: Notes from the newsroom on grammar, usage and style. (Some frequently asked questions are here.)

docs.lead_paragraph: Laws and politics aside, advocates say that more adoption agencies are seeing same-sex couples as a resource.

headline.seo: Census Shows Rise in Number of Gay Adoptions
headline.main: Adoptions by Gay Couples Rise, Despite Barriers
headline.print_headline: Adoptions Rise by Same-Sex Couples, Despite Legal Barriers

docs.snippet: Laws and politics aside, advocates say that more adoption agencies are seeing same-sex couples as a resource.

docs.lead_paragraph: A new approach to malpractice suits in New York is being seen as a way for states to curb liability expenses and health care costs.

headline.seo: In New York, Malpractice Negotiations Offer Way to Curb Health Care Expenses
headline.main: To Curb Malpractice Costs, Judges Jump In Early
headline.print_headline: To Curb Malpractice Costs, Judges Jump In Early

docs.snippet: A new approach to malpractice suits in New York is being seen as a way for states to curb liability expenses and health care costs.

docs.lead_paragraph: 9:45 a.m. | Updated WellPoint, one of the nation’s largest health insurers, has agreed to buy CareMore for about $800 million, according to people briefed on the transaction.

headline.main: WellPoint to Buy CareMore for $800 Million

docs.abstract: The deal, which was announced on Wednesday morning, would add to WellPoint’s already dominant position in California, Arizona and Nevada.
docs.snippet: The deal, which was announced on Wednesday morning, would add to WellPoint’s already dominant position in California, Arizona and Nevada.
